params.bettingDuration: Duration for betting period in seconds
params.targetYield: Target yield rate in basis points (1000 = 10%)
params.useRandomDuration: Whether to use secure random for duration variation

returns.marketIds: Array of market IDs the user has bet on

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

calculatePayout(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Calculate potential payout for a bet

claimWinnings(uint256).notice: Claim winnings from a settled market

getMarketOracleData(uint256).notice: Get oracle data for a market

getUserBets(uint256,address).notice: Get user's bets for a market

placeBet(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Place a bet on a market

settleMarket(uint256).notice: Settle a market using multi-oracle consensus
